meta.name: Fugitives: Caught on Tape
meta.description: "Fugitives Caught on Tape" follows law enforcement officers as they pursue fugitives on the run. With unprecedented access to a multitude of cameras including body and dash cams, security and traffic cams, personal doorbell footage, smartphone cams and more, viewers get a look at how agencies track down fleeing suspects.

videos.overview: Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. L.A.P.D. ground units work with helicopter officers to catch an alleged, multiple hit-and-run suspect; deputies and police in Florida chase an alleged murder suspect across county lines; deputies in New Mexico pursue a naked woman driving recklessly on the highway; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. Officers in Florida pursue a man who stole two police cars in the same day; shots are fired as deputies engage in a foot chase with an alleged cop killer; police respond to a report of a man attacked with a machete; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A man wanted for robbery and carjacking leads sheriff's deputies on a dangerous chase through crowded city streets; police get in a foot chase with an attempted murder suspect; a late night, 145 mile-an-hour highway pursuit; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. The dangerous pursuit of a convicted felon ends with a head-on collision with a police cruiser; a shoplifting suspect shoots at police and then sets his own house on fire during a standoff; air and ground units coordinate during a high-speed chase and foot pursuit; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A truck thief streams his high-speed chase on social media; a man wanted for double murder fires shots at pursuing officers; a man caught sleeping at a traffic light flees police and crashes a high-end sports car; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A car thief in New Mexico steals a vehicle from right under the noses of deputies; police in Wisconsin get in a foot chase with a serial evader; L-A-P-D officers engage in the slow-speed highway pursuit of an attempted murder suspect...on a bicycle; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A desperate couple hold a truck driver hostage in his own semi; marine patrol deputies chase down smugglers in a high-speed boat chase; officers report a late-night pursuit of a suspect fleeing...in reverse; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. Police on the ground and in the air pursue suspects as they commit multiple carjackings; officers chase a murder suspect through a crowded big box store; police pursue a convicted felon at speeds over 110 miles-an-hour; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A man wanted for assault, burglary and car theft leads state troopers and police on a high-speed chase across 3 states; a woman pulled over for speeding flees the scene but still manages to obey traffic laws; suspected auto thieves flee a hit-and-run to hide on a golf course; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run: Sheriff's Deputies, State Troopers and local police engage in a deadly gun battle at the end of a dangerous, high-speed pursuit; police, K-9 officers and air units track down a car thief who's attempting a water escape in a stolen kayak; State Troopers outwit a fugitive driving recklessly on a motorcycle; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run:Â an accused car thief jumps off a 36 foot bridge to avoid capture; an armed fugitive on the run breaks into a building full of law school students; a DUI suspect flees by car, by foot and finally by water before being captured by deputies; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run: a wanted felon smashes into a state trooper's car while fleeing from local police and county deputies; police get into a shootout with a man wanted for murdering his roommate; a deputy's PIT maneuver knocks a fugitive's car up on two wheels; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A man out on bond for a breaking and entering charge leads police on a high-speed chase down the wrong side of the highway; officers try to engage with a shoplifting suspect during a highway standoff; a convicted child sex abuser steals a Homeland Security vehicle while being detained; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run: deputies race to extract a mother and her daughters from their truck after a fleeing suspect crashes into them; fish and wildlife officers pursue a fugitive attempting to escape by swimming away; deputies attempt a PIT maneuver on a man accused of killing his girlfriend; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. 911 operators receive a call in the middle of a road rage incident; state troopers pursue a man wanted for domestic assault and fleeing with his 6-year-old son in the car; police attempt multiple PIT Maneuvers on two fugitives wanted for armed robbery; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. Police exchange gunfire in the streets of Tampa with a man wanted for stabbing his wife; a State Trooper performs a PIT Maneuver on a fleeing hit-and-run suspect, sending his car rolling off the road; police get in a high-speed chase with two men wanted for armed carjacking; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. Police and Highway Patrol pull a shoplifting suspect to safety after he hangs from a highway overpass; deputies, air units and K-9 officers chase down a suspect on foot and in the water; a man fleeing from police is ejected from his car after crashing; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A woman accused of shoplifting rams a police cruiser and leads officers on a dangerous, high-speed chase; State Troopers pursue an alleged, armed carjacker; police chase down a suspect in a stolen SUV; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. Deputies get in a high-speed chase with a man wanted for shooting a highway patrolman and stealing his cruiser; officers pursue a fugitive who's driving recklessly on a pedestrian only hiking trail; police and K-9 units chase down a suspect who jumped out of his car while it was still moving; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A man wanted for carjacking runs out of road during a high-speed chase; an officer climbs on the hood of a car while trying to prevent a fugitive from fleeing; a man arrested for fleeing/eluding and reckless driving screams apologies and declarations of love to his girlfriend; and more.

A suspect in a box truck causes multiple collisions on the highway before engaging officers in an airport shootout; a K-9 officer chases down a fugitive wanted for Aggravated Battery with a Deadly Weapon; and more.
After a high-speed chase ends with a horrifying crash on the highway, the suspect shocks officers by attacking one of the accident victims with a knife; and more.
Officers chase a stolen car with the victim's 1-year-old boy still in the back seat; an armed suspect who claims to be "C.I.A." flees from a traffic stop and rams a police cruiser; and more.

Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. Troopers chase a suspect off-road, through wrong-way highway traffic and across busy city streets as dangerous debris falls from the back of his stolen truck; and more.
Law enforcement officers pursue fugitives on the run. A getaway driver smashes into 3 police cruisers and a bystander's S-U-V while leading officers on a high-speed, parking lot chase; and more.
A man who tried to run his daughter over with a pick-up truck shoots at officers and rams a police cruiser; and more.
A convicted felon fleeing from police across a highway nearly gets hit by a semi-truck; and more.
A man with seven active warrants for his arrest tries to evade officers by throwing chocolate milk at their cruiser; and more.
A man fleeing from state troopers jumps off Florida's 7-Mile Bridge into the ocean below; a wanted man smashes into multiple cars while trying to flee from police at a gas station; and more.

An ex-con suspected of drunk driving flees a traffic stop and then tells a 911 operator that he'll shoot at officers if they stop him again; a woman rams into police cruisers with a baby in the backseat of her SUV; and more.

Police pursue a man driving his truck recklessly while towing a double-wide mobile home; a woman steals an officer's cruiser and rear-ends an SUV; officers engage in a bicycle pursuit for a suspect in a recent machete attack; and more.
A drunk driver flashes her middle finger while fleeing from troopers; a local Police Chief rolls his cruiser into a ditch after executing a PIT Maneuver; and more.
Multiple agencies face off against an armed fugitive who's abducted his 7-year-old daughter, a driver who crashed his car while fleeing from police gets tased; and more.

Two murder suspects fire shots at State Troopers during a high-speed, highway pursuit; police pursue a man driving a baggage trailer he allegedly stole from a local airport; State Troopers chase down a D-U-I suspect in a stolen ambulance; and more.
